summary: MY YUKON DASH IS CRACKED IN 2 PLACES.  THE DASH IS FLAPPING DUE TO THE WEIGHT OF THE SPEAKER. I AM CONCERNED ABOUT HAVING AN ACCIDENT AND THE AIRBAGS DEPLOYING AND SENDING SHARDS OF PLASTIC EVERYWHERE. I HAVE YOUNG GRANDCHILDREN.  THIS IS NOT A CHEAP VEHICLE. WE BOUGHT THE BEST.  I AM SHOCKED THIS IS NOT A RECALL. I AM VERY CONCERNED.
